 Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution (deduction version of ~ sbie ).  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)
statement:
sbied.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
sbied.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
sbied.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
sbied $p |- ( ph -> ( [ y / x ] ps <-> ch ) ) $.
